title: Kade

fields.name: *^-Translator's Note:
fields.value:
A kistune is a trickster fox creature in Ancient Japanese mythology. I suggest looking up the wikipedia article on them. -Mr.█████*
Attack:None
Defense:None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, select another player to stalk. At night, they will unable to do anything, And will have to hide in a cupboard, shower, or bed. You may choose to check either the restroom, kitchen, or bedroom. Bedroom beats bed, Restroom beats shower, and Kitchen beats cupboard.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you find them, you will transfur them, guaranteed.

desc:
Post 2898
*"The first of many components my project for a* Kitsune^ *, it has gotten along well with one of the tails, however, I am unsure if it can support multiple at once."-Dr.████,  MIT.*
